department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Royal Canadian Air Force’s (RCAF) has a requirement for forty (40) Cisco Catalyst 9200 Model C9200L-24T-4X-E, 24-Port Data, 4 x 10G, Network Switches, power supplies, software subscription licenses, technical support and warranty with the option of 50 more of the mentioned items in the next two years for Air Traffic Management Systems (ATMS) Radar Environmental and Data Display System Network (REDDS).
description: This is an amendment to the initial RFx noticepublished on Ariba Discovery. The responding bidder must submit its required supporting documents and bids on June 15, 2023, by 2 pm EST.
full_summary:
----------

### Cisco Catalyst 9200L L3 Switches (W3474-240001)

#### Reference Number
WS4031497063-doc4033513885

#### Solicitation Number
WS4031497063

#### Tender Status
This tender has expired.

#### Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Dates**
	+ Start Date: June 21, 2023
	+ End Date: March 29, 2024
* **Procurement Details**
	+ Category: Goods and Services (GD)
	+ Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
	+ Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Delivery Location
The deliveries will take place in the province of Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contracting Entity
* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact:
	+ Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Tender Description
The Royal Canadian Air Force's (RCAF) has a requirement for forty (40) Cisco Catalyst 9200 Model C9200L-24T-4X-E, 24-Port Data, 4 x 10G, Network Switches, power supplies, software subscription licenses, technical support and warranty with the option of 50 more of the mentioned items in the next two years for Air Traffic Management Systems (ATMS) Radar Environmental and Data Display System Network (
